seo.title: Vernazza FAQ 2025 | Common Questions About Visiting
seo.description: Get answers to frequently asked questions about Vernazza. Parking, best times to visit, luggage, swimming, and essential tips for the perfect trip.

body.title: Frequently Asked Questions
body.subtitle: Everything you need to know before visiting Vernazza. Answers to common questions about transportation, accommodation, and village life.

features.title: Can I drive to Vernazza?
features.description: Cars cannot enter the village. Very limited parking outside.

features.title: What about luggage?
features.description: Expect stairs. Pack light or use luggage transfer services.

features.title: Is there a beach?
features.description: Small rocky beach at the harbor. Perfect for swimming.

features.title: How long to visit?
features.description: Minimum half-day. Overnight stay recommended to experience sunset.

features.title: Best photo spots?
features.description: Harbor viewpoint, Doria Castle, and arriving by train.

features.title: ATMs available?
features.description: Limited ATMs. Bring cash or use cards at restaurants.
